linkedinCard.tagline: Experienced Software Engineer skilled in crafting performant & accessible products mainly for the web.

paragraph1.experience: with over 3 years of experience, specializing in bringing ideas to life in the vast world of web development. Throughout my journey, I’ve had the privilege of contributing to software development for a

paragraph2.focus: Currently, I’m primarily focused on building accessible products and creating exceptional solutions and impactful digital experiences for our clients at
paragraph2.professionalRealm: Outside the professional realm, I immerse myself in exploring new technologies,

paragraph3.technologies: Here are a few technologies I’ve been working with recently:

cards.title: Senior Software Engineer
cards.description: I’m responsible for managing direct client requests, assigning tasks within the team, and developing new features and modules to meet specific requirements. Additionally, I also monitor the process pull requests for production deployments.

cards.title: Full Stack Developer
cards.description: My role involved creating and customizing features to meet the needs of our clients. This included developing new functionalities, conducting thorough testing, as well as building web solutions.

cards.title: Full Stack Developer
cards.description: I worked on creating custom modules for Odoo, focusing on accounting and product management applications tailored to meet the needs of our clients. Additionally, I had the opportunity to contribute to the development of various features for web applications.

Realtime chat app that allows you to sign in/sign up easily using OAuth 2.0 (Google, GitHub, email/password). Users can connect with others and send text messages, emojis, stickers, media, files, and more.
A responsive blog featuring CSS animations, RSS feed, advanced search, tag filtering, and newsletter subscription. Records and displays article visit counts for user interaction analysis.

Chess Artificial Intelligence project utilizing the minimax adversarial search algorithm with alpha-beta pruning and heuristics. The system is designed to determine the optimal move within a specified depth.
A real estate management web app with four distinct roles, each offering specific functionalities within the system to manage the properties.

projects.title: Chatify
projects.shortDescription: Realtime chat app with robust support for messages, stickers, and media.
projects.description: Realtime chat app that allows you to sign in/sign up easily using OAuth 2.0 (Google, GitHub, email/password). Users can connect with others and send text messages, emojis, stickers, media, files, and more.

projects.title: Blog
projects.shortDescription: Web app featuring RSS feed, advanced search, and tag filtering.
projects.description: A responsive blog featuring CSS animations, RSS feed, advanced search, tag filtering, and newsletter subscription. Records and displays article visit counts for user interaction analysis.

projects.title: Health Risk Management Reporter
projects.shortDescription: Odoo Module designed to manage Health Risk Management reports.
projects.description: Odoo module crafted for streamlined HRM report management. It offers a robust and intuitive interface facilitating the creation, management, and exportation of reports.

projects.title: Easy Route
projects.shortDescription: An efficient loan management solution for streamlined loan processes.
projects.description: Java web app developed to efficiently manage loan requests, streamline the customer registration and evaluation process, and monitor and approve loans.

projects.title: Batch Payment Export
projects.shortDescription: Odoo module that allows you to export registered payments.
projects.description: Odoo module that allows you to export registered payments from the 'account.payment' model to a xls format.

projects.title: Salary Changes Report
projects.shortDescription: Odoo module that allows you to export a report of salary changes for employees to Excel.
projects.description: Odoo module that exports organized Excel reports of employee salary changes by filtering the salary changes recorded in the hr.contract model through the mail.tracking.value model.

projects.title: DGT-2 Overtime Report
projects.shortDescription: Odoo module that exports detailed DGT-2 format overtime reports, including costs, to Excel.
projects.description: Odoo module that exports detailed DGT-2 format overtime reports, including costs, to Excel. This module streamlines compliance and optimizes resource management.

projects.title: Hacker News Clone
projects.shortDescription: A Hacker News clone built with React.
projects.description: A Hacker News clone built with React and the Hacker News API. It showcases the top 20 stories with infinite scrolling for a seamless news browsing experience.

projects.title: To Do App
projects.shortDescription: A single page app to manage todos with data synchronization.
projects.description: A single page app to manage todos, the todos are synchronized with a backend service provided by jsonbin.io, ensuring data persistence.

projects.title: Chess AI
projects.shortDescription: Chess AI project utilizing minimax algorithm.
projects.description: Chess AI project utilizing the minimax adversarial search algorithm with alpha-beta pruning and heuristics. The system is designed to determine the optimal move within a specified depth.

projects.title: Real Estate App
projects.shortDescription: Web app for real estate management.
projects.description: A real estate management web app with four distinct roles, each offering specific functionalities within the system to manage the real estate properties.

projects.title: Programming Quizzes
projects.shortDescription: React-based web app for programming quizzes.
projects.description: A React-based web app to choose a programming language and respond to diverse and non-repetitive questions with code snippets.

projects.title: Google Translate Clone
projects.shortDescription: Simple Google Translate clone built with React.
projects.description: A Google Translate clone, built with React and powered by the OpenAI API.

projects.title: To Do List
projects.shortDescription: Node.js web app for task management.
projects.description: Node.js web app for task management with user-friendly features. Supports permanent/temporary logins and user info updates.

projects.title: Net Banking App
projects.shortDescription: Net banking app built in C#.
projects.description: Net banking app built in C# following ONION architecture and SOLID principles. Enables secure user logins and seamless financial transactions.

projects.title: Social Network App
projects.shortDescription: Node.js Social Network App.
projects.description: A Node.js Social Network App for creating user profiles, sharing posts and events, commenting, connecting with friends, and ensuring secure account access.

projects.title: Books App
projects.shortDescription: Node.js-based Books App for registration.
projects.description: Node.js-based Books App for registration of publishers, categories, authors, and their respective books.

projects.title: Real Estate Manager
projects.shortDescription: Odoo Real Estate Management module.
projects.description: Odoo Real Estate Management module allows you to manage properties, perform custom searches, assign sales agents and much more.

projects.title: E-Market
projects.shortDescription: C# ASP.NET Core web platform following SOLID principles.
projects.description: C# ASP.NET Core web platform following SOLID principles, offering secure user login, ad management, and image uploads.

projects.title: Journal App
projects.shortDescription: React Native journaling app built with TypeScript and Expo.
projects.description: React Native mobile app build with TypeScript using Expo to record our personal experiences like a journal.

projects.title: Emergency App
projects.shortDescription: React Native mobile app build with Expo for logging emergency calls.
projects.description: React Native mobile app built with TypeScript using Expo to log emergency calls received by the emergency team.
